#None
Press ⑤ and ⑥ to walk.

#Mipa
Oh! Pretty high wall!
But, I am can hop enough to get there!
#None
Press ① button to jump.

#Mipa
The passage is blocked. But I think I can try to move this box.
#None
Keep moving on a box to push it.

#Mipa_4
OH! Button!
#Mipa
What does it do?
There only one way to check this out!
#None
Press ③ to interact with buttons and switches.

#Mipa
This door is locked...
#Mipa_3
Should be the way to open it!

#Mipa
This box cound be helpful to get on this height.
I can try to use my Manget Hand to pull that box.
#None
Press and hold ② button to use Magnet hand.

#Mipa
There is two indicators above this door...
#Mipa_3
...
Looks like more than one button need to be pressed to open the door.

#Mipa
The laser below looks very unfriendly.
Need to find way to disable it.

#Mipa_4
Wooh...That was tricky.

#Note
Expedition Log Number 0.
The rooms here are arranged in a strange way.
All traps and puzzles are simply reset to their default state once new visitor is come in.
Interesting security system design.
#Mipa
... ... ... ...

#Note
Expedition Log Number 1.
These rays, or more accurately lasers, have odd structure.
Their power is high enough to destroy metal. But nevertheless, walls and boxes block radiation.
Wall and boxes materials cannot be defined.
#Mipa
Oh...
#Mipa_4
Well, at least I already know that lasers are bad, and boxes are good!

#Note
Expedition Log Number 2.
Currently unknown, how foreign objects end up here.
But any attempt to bring them out the room they are in was unsuccessful.
Most strange, that origin of some objects for sure not alien.
#None
FPS counter cheat: ③③③④④④②②②②

#Note
Expedition Log Number 3.
Trash disposal area. Unknown, if that compressed trash, will be burned or recycled.
Looks like it's just stacked here for some reason.
#None
Cheat that let you play as trash cube: ④④④①②③⑥④④④

#Note
Expedition Log Number 4.
Crashbomber this is a device that been created mainly for industrial purposes.
To easier mining process and cleaning out collapses, and other places, where will small radius charge would be useful.
However this is facinatic, because this tehnologie used here to clear out compressed trash.

#Mipa
Hello?
..........
#Poky
Ssshhhhhhhh!
..........
Let me enjoy sound of azure waterfall
#Mipa
Is it really azure?
#Poky
Of course it is!
How can not you see it?
#Mipa_4
OH! Sorry, my visors seeing everything in monochrome...
#Poky
Don't jump on bridge! It's flimsy.

#Poky
I told you.

#Poky
Again you? What do you need?
How to disable Field?
Bridge is flimsy?
Sorry for disturbing.

#Mipa_4
Excuse me for ruining silence, but, I am here to find the way to disable field.
#Mipa
Maybe you know where I can do this?
#Poky
I don't know myself. But I am almost sure, Queen of the Hive knows.
#Mipa_3
Hive? How can I get to the Hive?
#Poky
Just go straigt by the rooms, you will not miss it.
#Mipa_4
Thank you!

#Mipa
What do you mean bridge is flimsy?
#Poky
Look!
Some of the tiles has more cracks than others, it means, jumping on them more dangerous.
#Mipa_3
Hmmm...

#Mipa
Sorry for disturbing.
#None
When you done talking with someone, sometimes you can begin conversation with them again.
Press ③ near with someone to begin conversation once if you missed something.

#Mipa
Are you sure your sprites are final?
#Jobee
No idea!
Do I look good?
#Mipa
Well....
Better than previous version, I did say!
#Jobee
Thanks!
#Mipa
... ...
...
. . . . .
Date you later!
#Jobee
What?

#Mipa
Cheater!

#Mipa_2
...

#Mipa
Hm...When this button down, door is open.
#Mipa_3
I need to find something to keep this button pressed.

#Mipa
How weird!
Very carbonated liquid in bottle!
It pulls so much....
I guess, I can even use it...
#None
Press ① button in air to do second jump.

#Mipa
Bottle is just disappeared!
Looks like, I can't bring stuff from previous rooms...
...
Hope I will find it again!
It was fun!

#Mipa
Yay!
#None
All current passive items can be seen in upper-right corner.

#Mipa
The soil... Intresting...

#Mipa
Oh what is it?
Waterfall? Lavafall? I can't see...

#Wasp_2
Freeze!
#Mipa
???
#Wasp_2
Don't dare to move!
You can't enter Hive!
#Mipa
OH! Hive is here?
#Wasp_2
!!!
Everyone knows, here is our Hive! And we not allow anyone to enter, unless Queen said so!
#Mipa
But...I really need to...
Maybe...I can just go to queen, and ask herself?
#Wasp_2
UUUGH! I said! You can't enter Hive!!!
Enough of you!
I will kindly show you other way!
#Mipa
OH! Really?

#Wasp_2
I will make sure, you understand.

#Wasp_3
Okay!
Okay!
You win!

#Wasp_3
Ugh...
Forget about this.
#Mipa
In the room from where I came, there is a lost bee that cannot get home.
That bee is sobing.
#Wasp
Alright, I will help them.

#Mipa
Uh....
Actually...I was need to ask that Wasp how to pass this area.
...
Why good ideas always comes so late?

#Wasp
Your Majesty!
Let me notice you, someone is about to visit you!
#Jobee
I am already aware.

#Wasp_3
Ugh...
My apologies...

#Note
We are left to eat honey pie! Will back soon!
if you are come to visit Queen, please stay in the line.                                  *Sincerely, The Royal Guard*
#Mipa
That explains why there no any guards are here.
I don't see any line... I guess, I can just come in?

#Jobee
I wasn't expecting visitors.
Who are you?

#Jobee
Alright, once again.
Who are you?
#Mipa_4
My name is Mipa!
#Mipa
Wasp told me that I need permission of the Queen to visit her.
I deciced, that I can ask permission of the Queen while I visiting her.
#Jobee
That not make any sense you know?
#Mipa
!?
#Jobee
However, you already here, what you need?

#None

To cycle through your equipment items, hold ④ and then press ② button.

#Mipa
Don't worrie creature! I will make you out of there!
#None
Blobs can be used to boost Mipa's jump height.
Experiment with it.

#Mipa
Hello? Can I ask how to get to Queen, please?
#Namezys
*Sob* *Sob* It's on the right.
#Mipa
Why are you crying?
#Namezys
Passage is blocked, and I can't get home.
#Mipa
Don't worrie, we will find the way!

#Mipa
This is mine Magnet Hand!
I can use this to pull objects!
...
I guess, I always had it...can't remember.

#Mipa
This mysterious ring gives POWER!
So...it can be called Power Ring!
...
This can help me to lift heavy objects, maybe even throw them.

#Mipa
Crashbomber!
I feel, like I seen one before, but never had a chance to use it before.

#Mipa
This is bottle! And it has very carbonated liquid inside of it.
It has lable sticker attached to it saying 'KoaKola'.
I have no idea what it means.

#Mipa
Jobee gave me this jar. She said this honey very sticky.
And this is true!

#Commander
Get ready to enter!
Remember! Once you inside the field, we will not be able to contact you.
Good luck, and be careful.
#Mipa_0
Affirmative!

#None
Somewhere in space...

#None
Planet called [REDACTED], been colonized by a self-aware robots.

#None
Year after year, they were harvesting essential mineral.
That they used to produce even more a-like self robots.

#None
But once upon a time...
Mysterious floating pyramid appeared.

#None
It's forcefield emitted strange light that interrupted process of harvesting this mineral.

#None
And then [REDACTED], decided to send expeditioner, right inside this pyramid.
To find the way to disable forcefield.

#None
And name of this expeditioner was...
